attributes.action: Referendum for the public to decide if they want a mid-term General Election
attributes.additional_details: Labour have lied to the public and renaged on much of its manifesto. It is time for the public to decide if Labour are fit to continue running the country. A further four years without intervention; with so much civil unrest, could further fracture the nation. Listen to the public.
attributes.background: Hold an immediate referendum to allow the general public to vote for an early General Election (within the next 6 months).

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
